Rulings.Base:
1. Placing a Karakuri Counter does not start a Chain.
2. If the effect of "Karakuri Anatomy" is negated, all Karakuri Counters are removed from it.
3. If you Flip Summon a "Karakuri" monster, a Karakuri Counter will be placed on this card.
4. If you flip a "Karakuri" monster face-down with "Book of Moon", a Karakuri Counter will not be placed.

PSCT.Base: Each time a "Karakuri" monster's battle position is changed, place 1 Karakuri Counter on this card (max. 2). You can send this card from the field to the Graveyard to draw 1 card for each Karakuri Counter on this card.
